OrgName.entry: INTEGRAL THERAPY - THE M.E. RECOVERY CLINIC

Desc.entry: An ME recovery group which is designed as a space to share progress and explore tools for recovery in a small group setting. Open to anyone suffering with ME, CFS, Fybromyalgia or related conditions. The group focuses upon coaching and support using the Gupta Amygdala Retraining Recovery Programme and includes areas such as compassion, mindfulness, meditation, relaxation EFTand NLP, which aim to facilitate recovery of health and energy.
